# coderedcms is tied to a specific wagtail version. Upgrade them together.
coderedcms >=0.20, <0.21
django-bootstrap4
django-environ
django-redis
pillow
# coderedcms is tied to a specific wagtail version. Upgrade them together.
# wagtail is tied to specific Django versions, so this will hold back Django upgrades too
wagtail >=2.11, < 2.12
wagtailfontawesome
